ingredients.content: 700 g chicken breast, cut in strips (1 cm)
65 g Parmesan cheese, cut in pieces

preparations.content: Place a bowl on mixing bowl lid and weigh in chicken, lemon juice and paprika. Mix with spatula to combine then set aside to marinate for 30 minutes while you make the pesto.
Place Parmesan in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Remove 1 Tbsp grated parmesan and set aside.
Add to remaining Parmesan in mixing bowl, basil, pine nuts, garlic, extra virgin olive oil and salt then chop <b>20 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside while cooking chicken and pasta.
Place water and salt in mixing bowl (no need to wash bowl) then bring to the boil <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.

Add tagliatelle through hole in mixing bowl lid and cook <b>select time according to packet instructions/100°C//speed <b>. Meanwhile, heat frying pan on hob over a medium-high heat, add 1 Tbsp oil and fry chicken pieces for 3-4 minutes on each side until golden and cooked.
Drain tagliatelle through Varoma dish then transfer to a serving bowl.
Place serving bowl on mixing bowl lid and add 120 g pesto and the cooked chicken. Mix together then serve immediately with a scattering of reserved grated Parmesan.
